column4: this might be a stupid question, but is there a way to make ubuntu look the way it used to?
if you use it for a while you'll get used to it
lol but i hate it, and no i never will! :)
i tried another distro to avoid it (Deb) but it looks so cool i can't resist to use it :D
as ActionParsnip said, jump to another DE/WM
yep, it's still in development state btw, so do expect bugs
i wanted to get away from all that tinkering :/
blackbox, I used to waste too much time setting up keybindings and refining them - so forced myself to switch to vanilla ubuntu years back
try fluxbox it has keyboard shortcuts preconfigured
not cool though, they shouldn't make the out of box experience so bad
no use of complaints here, try to speak it with Mark
